name: Express Docs Dark
description: A decent dark mode for an otherwise light and sometimes low-contrasting site theme. Notes are darker and info/warning/etc. boxes are bordered with a related color rather than a hard to see background color. These should now be hard to miss when scrolling past.
additional_info: June 12, 2019 - Added styling for the search box. (Forgot to push this to UserStyles after I made the changes for myself some time ago.)
